notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: V.F. performed the experiments and wrote the manuscript; A.J.-V. wrote the manuscript in parts related with Scanning Electronic Microscopy; N.M. analyzed the mechanical data obtained and wrote the manuscript; R.P. carried out the processing of the composites with RTM; F.D. optimized the proportion of catalyst, hardener, resin and fibers used and wrote the manuscript and L.T. acquired the funds for open access publications and supervised the experiments conducted in this work.
